ch.powerunit.rules

Interface ExternalResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TestListenerRule, TestRule
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TemporaryFolder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemPropertiesRule

    public interface ExternalResource
extends TestListenerRule
    Default Rule to do some stuff before the test, and after (always).

    This interface is provided here as a facility for rule provider, which will implement the before() and after() methods. The idea is to support use case that access some external system which need preparation and cleanup between each test.

    To use this interface, implementer should :

    • Implement the method before() with the code that prepare the external resource (creation of folder, start of server, etc).
    • Implement the method after() with the code that cleanup the external resource (destruction of folder, shutdown of server, etc). This method is used even in case the test is in failure or error.
    Author:
    borettim
